Chapter 1
Promise of Deep Learning for Time
Series Forecasting
Deep learning neural networks are able to automatically learn arbitrary complex mappings from
inputs to outputs and support multiple inputs and outputs. These are powerful features that
oï¬€er a lot of promise for time series forecasting, particularly on problems with complex-nonlinear
dependencies, multivalent inputs, and multi-step forecasting. These features along with the
